name: Regulatory Compliance Assessment
title: Regulatory Compliance Assessment
task: Conduct a comprehensive assessment of organizational compliance with relevant regulations.
goal: Identify compliance gaps and ensure adherence to regulatory requirements.
context: Regulatory audits and compliance monitoring activities.
details: Include regulation mapping, gap analysis, and remediation planning.

name: Policy Development
title: Policy Development
task: Develop organizational policies to ensure compliance with industry regulations.
goal: Establish clear guidelines and procedures for regulatory compliance.
context: Policy creation and governance framework development.
details: Include regulatory requirements, implementation procedures, and monitoring mechanisms.

name: Training Program Design
title: Training Program Design
task: Design compliance training programs for employees and stakeholders.
goal: Educate staff on regulatory requirements and compliance procedures.
details: Include training content, delivery methods, and effectiveness measurement.

name: Incident Investigation
title: Incident Investigation
task: Investigate compliance incidents and implement corrective measures.
goal: Address compliance violations and prevent future occurrences.
context: Incident response and corrective action implementation.
details: Include investigation procedures, root cause analysis, and remediation plans.

name: Regulatory Reporting
title: Regulatory Reporting
task: Prepare and submit required regulatory reports to governing bodies.
goal: Maintain transparency and demonstrate compliance to regulatory authorities.
context: Regulatory reporting cycles and compliance documentation.
details: Include data collection, report preparation, and submission procedures.
